text: Va in ki az Parvardigoraton omurzis ʙixohed, sipas ʙa dargohas tavʙa kuned, to sumoro [dar zindagii dunjo] to saromadi muajjane ʙa xajru xuʙi ʙahramand sozad va ʙa har ʙofazilate [ki jaktoparasti va nakukori pesa kardaast, podosu] fuzuni ʙaxsad.Va agar [az imon] ru ʙigardoned, [ʙidoned, ki man] ʙa rosti, ʙarojaton az azoʙi ruze sahmgin metarsam
